body_html:
@tfboyd It is from https://github.com/tensorflow/benchmarks/blob/master/scripts/tf_cnn_benchmarks/tf_cnn_benchmarks.py
The multi-GPU Resnet50 performance stably drops from 840images/sec to 760images/sec.

Besides, I run a typical multi-GPU keras_inceptionV3 model (using tensorflow backend), it costs 62sec to finish an epoch with 20000 samples using TF1.4, and it costs 85sec to finish an epoch with 20000 samples using TF1.8.
